slides.description: Innovate in medical technology through advanced AI.
Delivering custom software for superior performance and user experience.
Leveraging big data for better health outcomes.

Home.description: Mediv Corp is a specialized company that builds medical software by integrating medical data with AI technology. Mediv offers innovative solutions by merging AI and medical data. We develop leading-edge technologies that drive change in the medical field, including electrocardiogram analysis, imaging diagnostics, and validation platforms for alternative animal testing, shaping the future of medical services.

home.title: Mediv
home.description: Mediv is an ICT convergence innovation company that leads the future of the biomedical industry through the development of big data solutions, AI software, and web platforms. It adds new value to the digital healthcare field through the combination of biomedical and AI.

about.title: About | Mediv
about.description: Explore Mediv’s mission, vision, and journey to lead the biomedical industry with innovative AI-based solutions.

business.title: Business | Mediv
business.description: Discover Mediv's business areas, advancing healthcare technology with AI, from medical data analysis to animal replacement validation.

research.title: Research | Mediv
research.description: From medical and bio big data solutions to AI-based platforms, check out Mediv’s main business areas that are leading the development of digital healthcare technology.

contact.title: Contact | Mediv
contact.description: Connect with Mediv to learn more about our services and opportunities to collaborate on healthcare innovation.

list.title: Building an analysis support platform
list.description1: We build a data-based analysis support platform for biomedical research and development.
list.description2: We provide efficient work processes through a researcher-friendly analysis support platform.

list.title: Data construction solution
list.description1: We improve research reliability through high-quality biomedical data collection and optimized purification processes.
list.description2: Maintains the quality of various biomedical data and supports systematic analysis.

list.title: AI-based analysis SW development
list.description1: We develop analysis software using AI technology to perform precise analysis of data.
list.description2: It supports data analysis in various fields, including medical, bio, statistical, signal processing, and imaging fields.

list.title: ICT convergence research support
list.description1: We support innovative research through the combination of biomedical and ICT technologies.
list.description2: We increase the efficiency of big data, AI, and advanced bio research through the latest IT infrastructure and partner organizations.

list.name: Chungbuk National University College of Medicine

Vision.title: Medical + Innovative Vision
Vision.subTitle1: Mediv is advancing towards becoming a global medical software company.
Vision.subTitle2: We aim to achieve innovative medical technology through AI and big data.

coreValue1.title: Innovation
coreValue1.content: We go beyond the limits of existing medical knowledge and technology to create new value through AI and data.

coreValue2.title: Communication
coreValue2.content: We listen to the voices of our clients and the medical field, creating solutions that grow together.

coreValue3.title: Expertise
coreValue3.content: By combining medical and IT expertise, we deliver the most trusted software solutions.

coreValue4.title: Responsibility
coreValue4.content: We prioritize health and safety, realizing technology that takes responsibility for people’s well-being.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.subTitle: Mediv considers privacy protection as our top priority
PrivacyPolicy.introParagraph: places great importance to the protection of users' personal information and complies with personal information-related laws and protection guidelines, such as the Personal Information Protection Act of the Republic of Korea and the Act on Promotion of Information and Communications Network Utilization and Information Protection, etc.
PrivacyPolicy.introDetails: Accordingly, Mediv establishes and discloses the following privacy policy pursuant to Article 30 of the Personal Information Protection Act to protect users' personal information and to handle related grievances promptly and smoothly.

section1.title: Article 1 (Types of Personal Information Processed)
section1.description: Mediv collects and processes the following personal information items.
section1.emailInquiry: Email Inquiries: Email address, inquiry details
section1.telephoneInquiry: Telephone inquiries: Phone number, inquiry details
section1.internetService: Information automatically generated during internet service use: IP address, cookies, MAC address, service usage records, device information, visit history, location information

section2.title: Article 2 (Purpose of Personal Information Processing)
section2.description: Mediv processes personal information for the following purposes and is not used for any other purpose. If the purpose changes, separate consent will be obtained in accordance with Article 18 of the Personal Information Protection Act.
section2.emailInquiry: Email and Telephone inquiries: Response to user inquiries
section2.telephoneInquiry: Visitor Management: In-house access control and records management
section2.visitorInquiry: Service improvement: Statistics and analysis to improve service quality and provide customized services

section3.title: Article 3 (Processing and Retention Period of Personal Information)
section3.description1: ① Mediv processes and retains personal information within the period of retention and use of personal information in accordance with laws or the period agreed upon by the information subject.
section3.description2: ② The processing and retention period of personal information for each item is as follows.
section3.emailInquiry: Email Inquiries: Up to 1 year after collection
section3.telephoneInquiry: Telephone inquiries: Up to 1 month after collection

section4.title: Article 4 (Provision of Personal Information to Third Parties)
section4.description: Mediv does not provide personal information to third parties without the consent of the information subject. However, it may be provided as an exception only in cases based on law.

section5.title: Article 5 (Principles of collection and non-disclosure of sensitive information)
section5.description: Mediv manages to prevent sensitive information from being disclosed while providing services, and takes non-disclosure measures without delay if requested by the information subject.

section6.title: Article 6 (Destruction of Personal Information)
section6.description1: ① Mediv destroys personal information without delay when the purpose of collection has been achieved or the retention period has expired.
section6.description2: ② Information in electronic form is deleted in a way that makes recovery impossible, and paper documents are shredded or incinerated.

section7.title: Article 7 (Rights of Information Subjects and Exercise Methods)
section7.description1: ① The information subject may request Medivh to view, correct, delete, or suspend processing of personal information at any time.
section7.description2: ② Information subjects can exercise their rights in writing, via email, etc., and Medivh takes necessary measures without delay after receiving the request.

section8.title: Article 8 (Personal Information Security Measures)
section8.description: Mediv is implementing the following technical, managerial, and physical measures to ensure the safety of personal information.
section8.ele1: Establishment and implementation of internal management plan
section8.ele2: Minimization and control of personal information access rights

section9.title: Article 9 (Cookie Usage and Rejection)
section9.description: Mediv uses cookies to provide customized services, and users can reject cookie storage through browser settings. However, if you refuse cookies, you may have difficulty providing some services.

section10.title: Article 10 (Personal Information Protection Officer)
section10.description: For inquiries regarding personal information, please contact us by email or phone.

section11.title: Article 11 (Request for Personal Information Access)
section11.description: Requests for access to personal information can be made to Medivh's personal information department, and Medivh will guide you through the procedures for requesting access in accordance with relevant laws and regulations.

section12.title: Article 12 (Standards for Additional Use/Provision Without Consent)
section12.description: When Mediv additionally uses or provides personal information without the consent of the information subject, it carefully determines whether it meets the standards set by law in accordance with Article 15, Paragraph 3 of the Personal Information Protection Act.

section13.title: Article 13 (Remedies for Rights Infringement)
section13.description: Users may contact the organizations below for consultation and relief related to personal information infringement.
section13.ele1: Personal Information Infringement Reporting Center: (without area code) 118
section13.ele2: Supreme Prosecutors' Office Cyber ​​Investigation Division: (without area code) 1301
section13.ele3: National Police Agency Cyber ​​Security Bureau: (without area code) 182

section14.title: Article 14 (Changes to Privacy Policy)
section14.description1: ① This policy may be revised according to changes in laws and internal policies.
section14.description2: ② When changes are made to the personal information processing policy, changes will be announced on the website.
